about_the_game:
Get Zephyr Prime Accessories now and make the newest Prime Customizations yours, instantly!

For more Prime Access Bundle options click here

PRIME ACCESSORIES PACK
· Commodore Prime Suit
· Tibor Prime Armor
· Tibor Prime Gene-Masking Kit
· 90 Day Affinity andCredit Boosters
· BONUS: Kavat Incubator Segment and Kavat Starter Kit

name: Warframe Zephyr Prime Access: Accessories Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP SP 3 or higher
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo e6400 or AMD Athlon x64 4000+
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 8600 GT or ATI Radeon HD 3600
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:25 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Make the newest Prime Customizations yours instantly. Zephyr Prime Accessories include: Commodore Prime Suit, Tibor Prime Armor, Tibor Prime Gene-Masking Kit, and 90 Day Affinity and Credit Boosters.
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
